title: Admin Authentication and Role-based Access Control
description: Verify that an Admin user can successfully log in, access admin features, and cannot access client or staff-only features.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid Admin credentials.
Submit the login form.
Verify login is successful.
Verify access to admin dashboard and management features.
Attempt to access client-specific features and confirm access is denied.
Attempt to access staff-specific features and confirm access is denied.

title: Staff Authentication and Role-based Access Control
description: Verify that a Staff user can log in, manage their availability, view assigned appointments and client details, and cannot access admin or client-only features.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid Staff credentials.
Submit the login form.
Verify login is successful.
Verify access to personal availability settings and assigned appointments.
Verify ability to access client details related to their appointments.
Attempt to access admin-only features and verify access is denied.
Attempt to access client-only features and verify access is denied.

title: Client Authentication and Public Booking Portal Access
description: Verify that clients can register, log in, and access the public booking portal with role-specific restrictions.

steps.description: Navigate to the client registration page.
Complete registration with valid client information.
Log in with registered client credentials.
Verify successful login and access to client booking interface.
Verify the client cannot access staff/admin-only features.
Verify client can select services and schedule appointments.

title: Appointment Booking with Availability and Overlap Detection
description: Ensure appointments can be scheduled only when staff and resources are available and overlaps are prevented including recurring appointments.

steps.description: Log in as a client or staff user.
Select a service and choose a desired appointment time.
Verify that staff availability is checked and only available times are shown.
Schedule an appointment that overlaps with an existing appointment.
Confirm that the system prevents overlap and displays an appropriate message.
Schedule a recurring appointment with valid recurrence rules.
Verify all recurring appointment slots respect availability and overlap rules.
View appointments in multiple calendar views.
Verify the appointments are correctly displayed in day, week, and month views.

title: Client Management with Profile Editing and Status Tracking
description: Test client profile creation, status updates, appointment history viewing, and filter/search functionality for client lists.

steps.description: Log in as Admin or Staff with client management privileges.
Create a new client profile with all mandatory fields.
Verify client profile is created and saved correctly.
Update client status and verify status change is reflected.
Check that appointment history for the client is displayed accurately.
Use filters and search on the client list page.
Verify the list updates correctly based on filter criteria and search terms.

title: Staff Management with Availability, Service Assignment, and Performance Tracking
description: Verify that staff profiles can be updated with availability schedules, assigned to services, and that performance metrics are tracked.

steps.description: Log in as Admin user.
Edit a staff member's profile to update availability schedule.
Verify availability changes are saved and reflected on booking interfaces.
Assign staff member to specific services or treatments.
Verify staff can only be booked for assigned services.
Review staff performance metrics on dashboard.
Verify performance stats match expected appointment and revenue data.

title: Inventory Management and Low Stock Alerts
description: Test inventory tracking, stock level updates on usage, issuance of low stock alerts, and purchase order creation workflow.

steps.description: Log in as Inventory Manager or Admin.
Add a new product with initial stock.
Verify product is listed with correct stock level.
Simulate stock usage by recording product consumption.
Verify stock levels decrease accordingly.
Reduce stock below low stock threshold.
Verify low stock alert is triggered and visible.
Create a purchase order for the low stock item.
Verify purchase order is saved and stock is updated post-receipt.

title: Service and Treatment Catalog Management
description: Ensure services can be created with correct pricing, category association, duration, and staff assignment, and are editable.

steps.description: Log in as Admin or Staff with service management privileges.
Create a new service with name, category, price, duration, and assigned staff.
Verify service is saved and appears in the catalog.
Edit an existing service's details.
Verify updates are saved and reflected across booking interfaces.

title: Dashboard and Analytics Metrics Accuracy
description: Validate that the business dashboard displays accurate KPIs, revenue analytics, appointment statistics, and growth indicators in real time.

steps.description: Log in as Admin user.
Navigate to the business analytics dashboard.
Verify all metrics (KPIs, revenue, appointment stats) are displayed.
Cross-check dashboard data with backend data samples.
Trigger appointment bookings, cancellations, and revenue transactions.
Confirm dashboard data updates in real-time accordingly.

title: Subscription and Billing with Mollie Integration
description: Ensure subscription management workflows complete successfully including subscription purchase, renewal, cancellation, and payment processing via Mollie.

steps.description: Log in as Admin with subscription management rights.
Initiate a new subscription purchase and select plan options.
Complete payment process via Mollie payment gateway.
Verify payment is successful and subscription is activated.
Renew an existing subscription via Mollie.
Confirm renewal payment is processed and subscription extended.
Cancel a subscription and verify cancellation workflow.
Ensure user access is adjusted post-cancellation.

title: Automated Email Notifications Triggering
description: Verify that automated emails including appointment reminders and notifications are sent based on user preferences and trigger conditions.

steps.description: Set up email templates and triggers in the admin email automation panel.
Schedule appointments with different users and configure reminder timings.
Verify appointment reminder emails are sent on schedule.
Modify user notification preferences to disable reminders.
Verify that reminder emails are not sent when disabled.
Trigger system notification emails like booking confirmations.
Verify notification emails content and delivery.

title: Real-time Updates with Supabase Realtime
description: Ensure that appointment changes, inventory updates, and notification events propagate instantly to all relevant users via real-time updates.

steps.description: Log in as multiple users in different roles (Admin, Staff, Client) on separate devices or browser sessions.
Make updates to appointments, inventory stock, and notifications from one session.
Verify that the updates appear in other sessions immediately without page reload.
Simulate network interruption and restore connection.
Verify that missed real-time updates are synchronized after reconnection.

title: Google Calendar Two-Way Sync
description: Validate that appointments created/updated/deleted within SalonSphere are synchronized to Google Calendar and vice versa without data loss or duplication.

steps.description: Connect user account to Google Calendar via OAuth.
Create a new appointment in SalonSphere.
Verify the new appointment appears in Google Calendar.
Modify the appointment time in Google Calendar.
Verify the updated time is reflected in SalonSphere.
Delete the appointment in Google Calendar.
Confirm appointment is removed from SalonSphere.
Create appointment in Google Calendar.
Verify appointment appears in SalonSphere.

title: Multi-Tenant Security and Row-Level Isolation
description: Confirm that each tenant's data is strictly isolated with row-level security and that users cannot access data from other tenants, ensuring GDPR compliance.

steps.description: Log in as user from Tenant A.
Attempt to access data that belongs to Tenant B via UI and API.
Verify access is denied and no data leakage occurs.
Execute direct API or database queries with tokens for Tenant A.
Confirm only Tenant A data is accessible.
Review logging and audit trails for data access.
Verify GDPR compliance is maintained in data handling and user consent.

title: Error Handling for Failed Payment via Mollie
description: Test system behavior and user notifications when payment processing via Mollie fails during subscription purchase or renewal.

steps.description: Initiate subscription payment via Mollie with invalid or declined payment methods.
Verify that transaction failure is detected and user is informed with an appropriate error message.
Ensure no subscription activation or renewal occurs on payment failure.
Retry payment with valid method after failure.
Verify successful processing and subscription activation.

title: Booking with Invalid Data and Edge Cases
description: Verify system validates input data and handles edge case scenarios like booking outside business hours, booking zero duration services, and extremely long durations.

steps.description: Attempt to book appointment outside configured business hours.
Verify booking is rejected with descriptive error.
Attempt to book a service with zero or negative duration.
Confirm validation error prevents booking.
Attempt to book an appointment with excessively long duration beyond allowed maximum.
Verify system prevents booking and informs user.

title: Notification Preferences Management
description: Test user ability to customize in-app notification preferences and verify notifications respect these settings.

steps.description: Log in as a user with notification settings available.
Navigate to notification preferences tab.
Change notification settings (enable/disable specific notification types).
Save preferences successfully.
Trigger events that normally cause in-app notifications.
Verify notifications are displayed or suppressed according to settings.

title: Business Settings Configuration and Persistence
description: Confirm that business hours, booking rules, tax settings, and domain configurations can be updated by Admin and are persisted correctly.

steps.description: Log in as Admin user.
Access business settings pages including hours, booking rules, taxes, and domain.
Update business hours to new time ranges.
Verify changes are saved and reflected in appointment booking.
Modify booking rules such as max appointment duration and buffer times.
Confirm rules are enforced on new bookings.
Update tax rates and save.
Verify tax calculation changes applied on billing and invoices.
Configure custom domain and validate domain accessibility.
Confirm custom domain is active and correctly routes to tenant.
